items: Start by standing in front of a bench or step with a barbell resting on your shoulders.
Place one foot on the bench or step, making sure your entire foot is firmly planted.
Push through your heel and lift your body up onto the bench or step, bringing your other foot up to meet the first one.
Step back down with the same foot you started with, keeping your other foot on the bench or step.
Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch legs and repeat the exercise on the other side.

content.title: Barbell Front Step Up Form & Visual

items: Strengthens the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings
Increases lower body power and explosiveness
Engages the core muscles for added stability
Can be modified for different fitness levels by adjusting the weight or height of the step
